messages.title: A Better Plan. A Better Future.
messages.content: David Hinder says 'It's time for a change'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will balance the books and cut the deficit without additional borrowing.
Labour will control immigration, only pay benefits out after two years and stop employers undercutting wages.
Labour will rebuild the NHS and make time to care, joining up services from home to hospital.
Labour will invest in education, cut tuition fees, boost apprenticeships and reduce school class sizes.
Labour will support small businesses, cut business rates and increase competition in the banking sector.

issues.education: Labour will invest in education, cut tuition fees, boost apprenticeships and reduce school class sizes.
issues.health: Labour will rebuild the NHS and make time to care, joining up services from home to hospital.
issues.immigration: Labour will control immigration, only pay benefits out after two years and stop employers undercutting wages.

leaflet.personalStatement: David Hinder says 'It's time for a change' 'I have lived in the Ribble Valley Constituency for 15 years. My children were brought up and educated here. I have spent my working life in manufacturing industry, banking and finance. I have also been a company director, but I have also experienced the stress and uncertainty of losing my job. As your MP, I would devote myself full time to representing all my constituents. In 2010, Labour came second in Ribble Valley. This time, letâ€™s go one better.'

images.caption: David Hinder, Labour Party Candidate for Ribble Valley
